title: Samples from Malmaison
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk
Technique: Satin stitch on plain weave foundation.
description: Mat with two fabric samples. The upper sample is embroidery using stamped silver metal on white cotton (floral shapes). The lower sample is an embroidery using white silk on aqua silk in an acanthus leaf design. The mat has been painted and gold leaf applied.
name: Samples from Malmaison
